rows.story_text: Fana and her family live in a busy town.

story_text.eng: Fana and her family live in a busy town.

annotation_1.eng: Fana lives in a very colorful town. Is your town colorful too?

annotation_2.eng: Point at and name all the colors of the clothes and buildings.

annotation_3.eng: Count together the people in this picture.

rows.annotation_1: Fana lives in a very colorful town. Is your town colorful too?
rows.annotation_2: Point at and name all the colors of the clothes and buildings.
rows.annotation_3: Count together the people in this picture.

rows.story_text: Fana has a cat, two hens, a goat and a dove.

story_text.eng: Fana has a cat, two hens, a goat and a dove.

annotation_1.eng: How many animals does Fana have?

annotation_2.eng: Which animal does Fana have the most of?

annotation_3.eng: Most people living in a city do not have so many different animals.

rows.annotation_1: How many animals does Fana have?
rows.annotation_2: Which animal does Fana have the most of?
rows.annotation_3: Most people living in a city do not have so many different animals.

rows.story_text: One day, Fana saw other children throwing stones at doves.

story_text.eng: One day, Fana saw other children throwing stones at doves.

annotation_1.eng: Throwing stones at animals is a mean things to do!

annotation_2.eng: What would you do if you saw someone doing something that was mean?

annotation_3.eng: Count all the birds. Which is more and which is less -- birds in the air or birds on the ground?

rows.annotation_1: Throwing stones at animals is a mean things to do!
rows.annotation_2: What would you do if you saw someone doing something that was mean?
rows.annotation_3: Count all the birds. Which is more and which is less -- birds in the air or birds on the ground?

rows.story_text:
Fana ran towards the children.

She shouted, "Stop throwing stones!"

story_text.eng:
Fana ran towards the children.

She shouted, "Stop throwing stones!"

annotation_1.eng: It is not easy to tell other people that you think they are being bad. Why did Fana do it?

annotation_2.eng: A rectangle is a shape with four straight sides like the shape of this page. Point out rectangles you see in this picture.

annotation_3.eng: Do you see any rectangles around where you are?

rows.annotation_1: It is not easy to tell other people that you think they are being bad. Why did Fana do it?
rows.annotation_2: A rectangle is a shape with four straight sides like the shape of this page. Point out rectangles you see in this picture.
rows.annotation_3: Do you see any rectangles around where you are?

rows.story_text: Fana took the two doves home to look after them.

story_text.eng: Fana took the two doves home to look after them.

annotation_1.eng: It is very nice of Fana to help these animals. It can be dangerous to handle wild animals.

annotation_2.eng: Count the number of people and the number of birds. Which group is bigger and which group is smaller?

annotation_3.eng: What do their faces tell you about what they are feeling?

rows.annotation_1: It is very nice of Fana to help these animals. It can be dangerous to handle wild animals.
rows.annotation_2: Count the number of people and the number of birds. Which group is bigger and which group is smaller?
rows.annotation_3: What do their faces tell you about what they are feeling?

rows.story_text: She fed them and told her family how she saved them.

story_text.eng: She fed them and told her family how she saved them.

annotation_1.eng: How many children and how many adults are there in Fana's family? When you put those groups together, how many people are there in her family?

annotation_2.eng: There are many colors of the rainbow here. Which colors are present and which ones are missing?

annotation_3.eng: Which colors and patterns are your favorite to wear?

rows.annotation_1: How many children and how many adults are there in Fana's family? When you put those groups together, how many people are there in her family?
rows.annotation_2: There are many colors of the rainbow here. Which colors are present and which ones are missing?
rows.annotation_3: Which colors and patterns are your favorite to wear?

rows.story_text: Fana and her parents took the doves to the clinic.

story_text.eng: Fana and her parents took the doves to the clinic.

annotation_1.eng: Most doctors either help people or they help animals. Which kind of doctor is at this clinic?

annotation_2.eng: Who is the shortest person in this picture? Who is the tallest?

annotation_3.eng: The red cross on the cabinet shows that it has medical supplies in it.

rows.annotation_1: Most doctors either help people or they help animals. Which kind of doctor is at this clinic?
rows.annotation_2: Who is the shortest person in this picture? Who is the tallest?
rows.annotation_3: The red cross on the cabinet shows that it has medical supplies in it.

rows.story_text: Fana tells her friends, "Animals are our friends. We protect them."

story_text.eng: Fana tells her friends, "Animals are our friends. We protect them."

annotation_1.eng: Should we only protect our friends, or should we protect everything we can?

annotation_2.eng: Look at all the color patterns in these clothes. Point out which ones are solid, striped, or have a checkered pattern.

annotation_3.eng: Fana has worn many different colors during this story. Can you remember them all?

rows.annotation_1: Should we only protect our friends, or should we protect everything we can?
rows.annotation_2: Look at all the color patterns in these clothes. Point out which ones are solid, striped, or have a checkered pattern.
rows.annotation_3: Fana has worn many different colors during this story. Can you remember them all?
